verbs.description: The Washington Capitals [V: would] n’t have far to travel if they win the Stanley Cup and are invited to be honored at the White House . But if the Capitals take the Cup home and are summoned to a ceremony with President Trump , a short trip will surely turn into a long and contentious discussion .
